Name: Myth Bearer
About the game: Myth Bearer is an open-ended adventure game that seamlessly blends RPG mechanics and puzzle solving, all rendered in glorious low-res pixel art! Actions taken during your journey are permanent - enemies donâ€™t respawn, consumed items are forever gone, and story events have profound impacts on the world. Are you ready to brave a mysterious world full of danger and fortune? Prepare yourself, a greater challenge has yet to reveal itself... Features: Full mouse control, with the option to use WASD/arrow keys for movement. Open-ended, interconnected level design. High potential to sequence break and skip story chapters. A dynamic game world that changes as the story progresses. Unlockable challenge mode.
